post.text:
Join us right here on my Facebook page - for pre and post debate coverage! 

Coverage begins at 8:30pmE!

comment.author: Benjamin
comment.text: Reposted: "From Australia looking in and reading news everyday from multiple sources and doing my homework as we are watching closely. I am really blown away with how much support you have Hillary! Trump might have a foul mouth and make stupid mistakes but I think he is more genuine about his Country and where it needs to go. I am actually scared for the world if you get in...."
